items.title: Everything Is Content for the ‘Clicktatorship’
items.description: In the second Trump administration, online conspiracy theories are shaping real-world policies like never before.

items.title: Roblox’s AI-Powered Age Verification Is a Complete Mess
items.description: Kids are being identified as adults—and vice versa—on Roblox, while age-verified accounts are already being sold online.
